block.p: Baseball
American League

BALTIMORE ORIOLES -- Recalled OF Jeffrey Hammonds from Rochester of the International League. Sent RHP Jimmy Haynes to Rochester. Sent RHP Greg Dean from Bowie of the Eastern League to High Desert of the California League. Promoted SS Richard Paz from Bluefield of the Appalachian League to High Desert.
Baseball
American League

BALTIMORE ORIOLES -- Recalled OF Jeffrey Hammonds from Rochester of the International League. Sent RHP Jimmy Haynes to Rochester. Sent RHP Greg Dean from Bowie of the Eastern League to High Desert of the California League. Promoted SS Richard Paz from Bluefield of the Appalachian League to High Desert.
MILWAUKEE BREWERS -- Traded OF Greg Vaughn to the San Digeo Padres for RHP Bryce Florie, LHP Ron Villone and OF Marc Newfield.
SEATTLE MARINERS -- Designated RHP Blas Minor for assignment. Recalled OF Raul Ibanez from Tacoma of the PCL. Named Kevin Mather vice president of finance and administration. National League
NL -- Suspended Chris Sabo, Cincinnati Reds third baseman, for seven games and fined him $25,000 for using a corked bat.
PITTSBURGH PIRATES -- Placed RHP Elmer Dessens on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of RHP Dave Wainhouse from Carolina of the Southern League.
SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS -- Designated 1B Dan Peltier for assignment. Northeast League
ADIRONDACK LUMBERJACKS -- Released RHP Chris Sinacori. Traded RHP Doug Clark to the Albany Diamond Dogs.
ALBANY DIAMOND DOGS -- Traded INF Fausto Ramirez to the Elmira Pioneers.
ELMIRA PIONEERS -- Traded INF Brian Moeglin to the Adirondack Lumberjacks. Northern League
SIOUX FALLS CANARIES -- Signed RHP Jeff Hrepich. Released RHP Chris Pollard. Western Baseball League
WBL -- Announced that Chico, Calif. has been awarded a franchise for the 1997 season.
Basketball
National Basketball Association
NBA -- Disapproved the contract between F Juwan Howard and the Miami Heat because the salary exceeded the salary cap.
NEW JERSEY NETS -- Signed G Robert Pack to a multiyear contract. Continental Basketball Association
QUAD CITY THUNDER -- Traded G Jay Taylor to the Yakima Sun Kings for G Kareem Townes.
Football
National Football League
CINCINNATI BENGALS -- Claimed QB Jay Fiedler off waivers from the Philadelphia Eagles. Waived QB Dave Barr.
DENVER BRONCOS -- Signed RB Terrell Davis to a five-year contract.
JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS -- Signed OL James Bailey.
Hockey
National Hockey League
DALLAS STARS -- Signed C Mike Modano to a one-year contract.
PHILADELPHIA FLYERS -- Signed RW Brian Wesenberg.
PITTSBURGH PENGUINS -- Signed F Shawn Antoski and F Dan Quinn.
ST. LOUIS BLUES -- Signed F Kevin Plager. American Hockey League
KENTUCKY THOROUGHBLADES -- Named Vasily Tikhonov and Mark Kaufman assistant coaches. International Hockey League
GRAND RAPIDS GRIFFINS -- Acquired G Pokey Reddick from the Las Vegas Thunder for future considerations. Named Robert Jones equipment manager.
LAS VEGAS THUNDER -- Traded D Marc Laniel to the Cincinnati Cyclones for future considerations.
MANITOBA MOOSE -- Named Randy Carlyle assistant general manager and assistant coach. Colonial Hockey League
MADISON MONSTERS -- Announced the resignation of Mark Johnson, coach and general manager.
THUNDER BAY SENATORS -- Signed LW Craig Mittleholt.
College
NCAA -- Placed Maine on probation for rules violations involving more than half its sports programs and barred the hockey team from postseason play.
ARIZONA STATE -- Announced the resignation of Bob Welch, pitching coach. Named Dave Sinnes pitching coach.
BALL STATE -- Named Calvin Kuphall associate athletic director.
DELAWARE -- Named Shane Brey men's assistant basketball coach.
HOLY CROSS -- Named Marc Young men's tennis coach. Announced that Barry Parenteau, women's swimming coach, will also coach the men's swimming team.
INDIANA STATE -- Announced the resigntion of Bob Doty, assistant baseball coach.
MIDDLE GEORGIA -- Named Robert Howard baseball coach, Terri McElveen women's tennis coach, and Dale Hatcher men's basketball coach.
NORTH CAROLINA-ASHEVILLE -- Named Jimmy Wilder director of athletic development.
SAN JOSE STATE -- Named Eric Arnold women's golf coach.
TEXAS -- Named Augie Garrido baseball coach.
WESTMINSTER, MO. -- Named Scott Wilson defensive line and inside linebackers coach.
